subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams did what he could, scoring 27 points with 13 assists, but it wasn’t enough to fend off the 76ers, who shot 53 percent from the field and hit 8 of 15 3-pointers.
snippet: Deron Williams did what he could, scoring 27 points with 13 assists, but it wasn’t enough to fend off the 76ers, who shot 53 percent from the field and hit 8 of 15 3-pointers.
